 system.print("")

 end

if string.find(T,"clear") then
    str = string.gsub(T, "clear" ,"")
 core.deleteSticker(tonumber(str))
 end

if string.find(T, "transfer") then
   str = string.gsub(T, "transfer","")
   iid = tonumber(str)
   c_pos = core.getElementPositionById(transfer_units[iid])
   system.print("Arrow added. Index : " .. core.spawnArrowSticker(c_pos[1],c_pos[2],c_pos[3]+4,"down"))
 end

core=""
screens = {}
TUs = ""
scr = 1
system.print("Transfer Unit Monitor v1.0")
system.print("type help for available commands")

for slot_name, slot in pairs(unit) do
    if type(slot) == "table"
        and type(slot.export) == "table"
        and slot.getClass
    then
        slot.slotname = slot_name
        if slot.getClass():lower():find('screenunit') then 
            table.insert(screens,slot)
            slot.activate()
        elseif slot.getClass():lower():find('coreunit') then core=slot
        end
    end
end

if #screens == 0 then system.print("No screen detected")
else
    table.sort(screens, function(a,b) return a.slotname < b.slotname end)
    local plural = ""
    if #screens > 1 then plural = "s" end
    system.print(#screens .. " screen" .. plural .. " connected.")
end

if core == "" then
    system.print("No core connected! Ending script.") unit.exit() else system.print("Core connected")
end

elementIdList = core.getElementIdList()
transfer_units = {}

for index,id in ipairs(elementIdList) do
    elementType = core.getElementDisplayNameById(id):lower()
    if (elementType:find("transfer")) then table.insert(transfer_units,id) end
end    
   
if #transfer_units < 9 then scr = 1
        elseif #transfer_units < 19 then scr = 2 end

scr = math.ceil(#transfer_units/68)    
system.print ("Screens needed: " .. scr)
